feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: granola.ai app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18585
  • fix: wrong Meeting Ended payload in zapier by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18202
  • fix: Create dub links if valid url by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18588
  • docs: fix error introduced in #18578 by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18593
  • feat: Round Robin weights future members toggle by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17782
  • fix: detailed customer card by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18511
  • chore: app router - all sub-pages in /apps by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16976
  • chore: app router 404 page by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18597
  • feat: render custom error page for unexpected sever error + removepages/_error by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18606
  • fix: app router not-found page cannot be static by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18610
  • fix: unkey async false by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18611
  • chore: redirect to /500 if pathname does not exist + better error handling by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18615
  • chore: gracefully handle 404s from pages router's dynamic pages + tests by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18618
  • chore: use custom 404 in pages/_error by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18622
  • fix: parsing teamId by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18623
  • chore: restore error pages for pages router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18625
  • fix: disabling guest workflow emails by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18628
  • revert: "feat: bulk shorten links with dub.links.createMany (#18539)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18587

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.16...v4.8.18

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: disable sending sms when email is present by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18632
  • fix: main lint errors by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18634
  • feat: don't show zapier/make webhooks in webhook list by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18607
  • fix: make ESLint work and fix lint errors that were undetected before by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18639
  • chore: clean up config matcher in middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18638
  • fix: potential fix for flaky layout shift by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18651
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18598
  • fix: /booking page datefilter by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18654
  • chore: log error to Sentry in app router error page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18637
  • perf: improve routing insights view (2) by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18566
  • feat: get org ooo entries and filters/sort by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18645
  • fix: phone number in confirmation email by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18642
  • chore: platform libraries readme publish reasons by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18646
  • fix: BUG: adding filters to settings/teams/[team-id]/members page thrâ€¦ by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18631
  • perf: no need for two query fetches for d link (private booking page) by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18659
  • fix: html render from calendar invite by @Praashh in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18577
  • feat: Routing form submitted but no booking - Salesforce actions by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18616
  • chore: migrate /team booking pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18656
  • fix: Booker atom name booking field by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18653
  • chore: migrate /org team pages, team type pages and user type pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18668
  • refactor: use DataTable for /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18589
  • fix: Remove export keyword @ route - only default allowed by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18682
  • fix: disable custom templates for free plan by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18635

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.18...v4.8.19

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add back global-error.tsx by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18692
  • fix: revert app error pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18696
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18699
  • fix: Revert - chore: app router - all sub-pages in /apps #16976 by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18702

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.19...v4.9.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Booking atom phone booking field and booking fields order by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18678
  • fix: v2 booking guests by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18690
  • feat: Allow non-calcom domains to run team slug pages by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18711
  • fix: add decoding logic to app router params by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18712
  • feat: Salesforce - map booking questions to event record by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18532

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.0...v4.9.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Revert - "revert app error pages #18696" PR by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18714
  • perf: Move CRM event creation to tasker by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18370
  • fix: resize app-store images to use less bytes by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18675
  • fix: Booking with the same email when using capital letters by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18694
  • fix: filters ui breaking on mobile in routing insights page by @cnhhoang850 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18713
  • feat: Salesforce - write to field without validation by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18722
  • fix: edit webhook time by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18549
  • chore: clean up <HeadSeo> components where not needed by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18731
  • chore: migrate /auth/error by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18730
  • chore: migrate /auth/new by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18732
  • fix: duplicating an event turns private link on by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18727
  • fix: Getting an error with managed events when accessing through api/v1 by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18683
  • fix: Impersonation issue from userstable by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18608
  • fix: potential org slug fix by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18718
  • chore: Bump Dub version to fix createMany error by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18591
  • chore: technical debt clearing - remove getServerSideProps for /event-types by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18733
  • feat: Use dub.customer.list to issue dual-sided incentives by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18452

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.1...v4.9.2
